channel.title: My server just randomly stopped working?
channel.description:
hello my server was/is called dynamicscape it was a aggroth source + client and i changed alot of things i used utorrent + no-ip to portfoward and host my server randomly it just stopped working and i tried loads of things and the port 43594 isnt opening i had the server up for like 1 month
i didnt get ddossed i dont think and idk whats wrong
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/oh7bf5.png[/img]
